item.title: LuxPunk or Arganopunk
item.description: Daily Life: Link to heading Decentralized Cities Eco-Tech Homes Vertical Markets Nomadic settlements Economy & Trade Link to heading Crypto and Smart Contracts Decentralize Energy Markets Private Arbitration & Law Hyper-Specialization (People donÂ´t work 9-5m but sell niche expertise and services) Governance & Security Link to heading No Centralized Goverment (city-states, co-ops, freehold settlements) Competing Private Services Mutal Defense Networks Technology & Infrastructure Link to heading 3D printing Everything Biohacking & DIY Medicine Drone & AI Logistics Underground & Floating Cities
